heading: HR00468
0: RESOLUTION REQUESTING DOMESTIC SHIPPING COMPANIES NATIONWIDE TO SET-UP AIRLINE-TYPE ONLINE ELECTRONIC BOOKING (E-BOOKING) SYSTEM TO SOLVE THE DISCOMFORT OF LINING AT TICKETING CENTERS AT THE PORT AREAS AND FOR THE MARITIME INDUSTRY AUTHORITY (MARINA) TO ENJOIN THEM TO DO SO
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2016-10-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00468
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION REQUESTING DOMESTIC SHIPPING COMPANIES NATIONWIDE TO SET-UP AIRLINE-TYPE ONLINE ELECTRONIC BOOKING (E-BOOKING) SYSTEM TO SOLVE THE DISCOMFORT OF LINING AT TICKETING CENTERS AT THE PORT AREAS AND FOR THE MARITIME INDUSTRY AUTHORITY (MARINA) TO ENJOIN THEM TO DO SO
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : RELAMPAGOS, RENE L.

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
